DOC.brief_summary: In animal human study , histochemical physiological evidence show muscle transfer slow , fatigue-resistant muscle fast , fatigable muscle spinal cord injury . The alternation muscular property accompany alternation spinal circuitry property , related immobilization adaptation . Previous study show remobilization continuous passive motion ( CPM ) one month would restore function spinal circuitry individual chronic SCI . It possible long term application CPM reverse adaptation contractile property paralyze muscle SCI . The purpose study investigate effect four month CPM training muscular property individual chronic SCI .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Continuous Passive Motion Spinal Circuitries Its Adaptation Patients With Spasticity Resulting From Upper Motor Neuron Lesions
